title: Calories in Arby's Classic Roast Beef
meta_description: Discover calories in Arby's Classic Roast Beef sandwich, including full nutrition breakdown with protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in Arby's Classic Roast Beef
assumptions: Standard Arby's Classic Roast Beef sandwich with roast beef, sesame seed bun, red ranch sauce; values based on official nutrition data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; check Arby's app or menu for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One Arby's Classic Roast Beef sandwich contains about 360 kcal and 23 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast food menus.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Arby's Classic Roast Beef?
What's the protein in Arby's Classic Roast Beef?
faqs.a: About 23 g of protein per sandwich.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Arby's Classic Roast Beef?
faqs.a: Around 810 mg of sodium per sandwich.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Arby's Classic Roast Beef?
faqs.a: Yes, about 41 g carbs, including 2 g fiber and 6 g sugars.

faqs.q: Does Arby's Classic Roast Beef have trans fat?
faqs.a: It contains 0.5 g trans fat per sandwich from the bun and sauce.
